content:
art Award CeremonyEvery year Sac States art department puts on a student award show PERIOD James Angellos selfportrait was displayed at the spring  art award ceremony PERIOD Angello also won an award.Dan Wars  State Hornet

Kayla OliverioFebruary  

Brightly colored photographs a 7foot metal sculpture and even a deconstructed typewriter were featured at the Art Department Awards Ceremony Friday night in the Else Gallery at Kadema Hall PERIOD

Friends family faculty and award winners composed the modest crowd of about  people who came to support the students and the art department PERIOD

Photographs and paintings hung on the clean white walls while sculptures stood in corners and on pedestals PERIOD Attendees stood before each piece admiring and discussing their thoughts on the artists experience PERIOD

Pat Chirapravati assistant chair of the art department was on hand to help host the awards ceremony for the  winners PERIOD

There are several categories of awards Chirapravati said PERIOD Theres a student who was awarded as an artist in several kinds of art mediums PERIOD There are awards for grad students and awards for photography PERIOD The rest are students whose work is getting recognition. according to Chirapravati there are about  different types of media that Sac State students choose to work in PERIOD From photography and painting to metal work and mixed media the art students are free to express themselves in numerous ways PERIOD

There were  art pieces submitted but only the top notch of the art department were chosen to win awards and scholarships Chirapravati said PERIOD Artistic ability is not the only requirement for submitting a piece to win an award  students must also maintain a . gPA PERIOD

One of the winners studio art major Chloe Lynch proudly stood by her winning sculpture that she struggled to title Words Escape Me. the metal work piece consisted of a deconstructed typewriter escaping from a torn apart bird cage PERIOD

I had a lot of trouble thinking of a title for it Lynch said PERIOD It shows how powerful words are and how difficult it is finding the right thing to say PERIOD Art is my outlet to express myself without words. lynch said it took her about  hours to put together the sculpture a piece made of two items she bought off Craigslist PERIOD

The project was to metamorphosis PERIOD I had to turn one thing into something else PERIOD I had to learn to cut through metal and it was hard taking the typewriter apart Lynch said PERIOD

She admitted to being very excited and shocked by her award because she is new to threedimensional arts PERIOD

Chirapravati beamed with pride as she was surrounded by the students accomplishments PERIOD

I think it is kind of an exciting exhibition to see our students go from where they were to where they are now Chirapravati said PERIOD

Kayla Oliverio can be reached at emailprotected

Your donation will support the student journalists of Sacramento State University PERIOD Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD
